sentences.en: "You said there was something you wanted to ask me," he said politely.
sentences.cn: “您说过有事要问我，”他彬彬有礼地说。

sentences.en: "Your home is beautiful," I said politely.
sentences.cn: 我客气地说：“你的家真漂亮。”

sentences.en: Another thing, you should do is politely tell why could this happen, and what to do next.
sentences.cn: 还有一件事情需要注意，你应该客气地告诉他们为什么会发生这个问题，下一步该怎么做。

sentences.en: Both boys had good manners, politely shaking hands.
sentences.cn: 这两个男孩都很有礼貌，友好地握了手。

sentences.en: Don't try to dictate to children; they will obey you better if you ask them politely.
sentences.cn: 不要对孩子们发号施令,你如果礼貌地要求他们, 他们会更听话的.

sentences.en: He cannot refuse if you ask politely.
sentences.cn: 如果你客气一点的话,他是不会拒绝的.

sentences.en: He has a politely diffident manner.
sentences.cn: 他的态度是客气中带有羞怯.
我很客气地把它还了回去。
她有礼貌地向我行了个屈膝礼。
她客气地说出她的借口.

sentences.en: She smiled, politely rather than with tenderness or gratitude.
sentences.cn: 她只是出于礼貌地笑了笑，而非出于关心或感激。

sentences.en: The audience are strangely subdued, clapping politely after each song.
sentences.cn: 观众们出奇地安静，只是在每首歌结束后报以礼貌性的掌声。

sentences.en: The girl bobbed politely at him.
sentences.cn: 那姑娘礼貌地向他行了个屈膝礼.

sentences.en: The suggestion might be worded more politely.
sentences.cn: 那项建议的措辞可以更婉转些.

sentences.en: They spoke to me very seriously but politely.
sentences.cn: 他们非常严肃却不失礼貌地和我说话。

sentences.en: You should deal with him more politely.
